CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. C3, reads: "Photos of Your Pittsburgh Story Rally - Speaker's Platform - Shown on the speakers' platform are (left to right):...Dr. James M. Nabrit, Howard University President, co-main speaker; Mrs. Daisy Lampkin, who presented Mrs. Vann as mistress of ceremonies; the Rev. Leroy Hacker, originator of the idea for an Appreciation Day, and the Rev. Clarence A. Burrell of Mt. Ararat Baptist Church, who gave the benediction."
TitMainTitle: P. L. Prattis, Bishop Joseph Gomez, Jessie Vann, Dr. James M. Nabrit, Daisy Lampkin, Rev. Leroy Hacker, and Clarence A. Burrell seated on stage in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall, for Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper's Appreciation Day rally
